Package.Name: Armor Inspector by wotinspector.com (Online)
Package.Description: When the mod is installed properly, the button Armor Inspector will appear at the garage right under the tank and above the maintenance buttons. \nClick on it and you are redirected to the selected tank on wotinspector.com.\nShots from the last battle are autimatically accessible when you open Armor Inspector.

Package.Name: Little Helper Collection [by {author}] (READ DESCRIPTION + WARNING)
Package.InternalNotes: 2020-02-09: We don't need to have a 'disable all' option for this mod anymore because CHAMPi has stated that all options in this mod are off by default.
Package.Author: Champi
Package.Description:
The mod collects some useful improvements that never made it to their own mod. 
Not because they're useless, but because they're too small for an own mod. But now I've combined them all in one mod and give the player control to turn them on and off

Features: - hangarTooltip -> Expands the list of tanks on which the equipment is installed (in hangar tips)
- storageTooltip -> Shows the full selling price of modules, consumables and ammunition (in stock)
- contourIconMode -> Disables the flipping of the tank contour icons in the tankman info tooltip. This is for using custom tank contour icons.
- arenaBorderRecolor -> Allows to set a new arena border color. It looks really good to see some fresh new colors there
- disableHeroTank -> Disables the promotion of a tank in the background of the hangar.


WARNING:
This mod can conflict with XVM-, AnnoyingFeaturesRemover- and some other Garage-Settings.

Package.Name: Always show vehicle compare button in the garage
Package.Description:
If enabled the vehicle compare button on the lower right in the garage will not removed.
Note: Changes only take effect after you re-entering the garage. (After a battle or reloading the game client) or after clearing the comparesation list. Credits are going to goofy67 for the code snippet.

default: unchecked

Package.Name: Enable arena border color change
Package.Description: When enabled the arena border color will be changed to the defined color.

Package.Name: Show player real names in battle results
Package.Description:
If activated, the player's real names are shown in the battleresult dialog.

default: unchecked

Package.Name: Disable blinking notifications in the garage
Package.Description:
Disables the blinking button when new notifications available in the garage.

Default: unchecked

Package.Name: Disable 'decal award recieved' window after battle
Remove event widgets on the lower right side in the garage
Disable help hint for dualgun tanks or wheeled vehicles at the beginning of the battle
Package.Description:
Disables the vehicle help hint for double barrel tanks or wheeled vehicles at the beginning of the battle.

Default: unchecked

Package.Name: Disable promotional tank display in the garage
Package.Description:
Disables the promotion of a tank in the background of the garage.
Note: Changes only take effect after re-entering the garage. (After a battle or reloading the game client)

Default: unchecked

Package.Name: Remove the "peep" sound after a tank is destroyed (new 1.12 feature)
Disable personal mission quest hint
Package.Description:
Disables the personal mission quest hint at the beginning of the battle.

Default: unchecked

Package.Name: Disable teaser widget in garage
Package.Description:
Disables the teaser widget in the garage
Note: Changes only take effect after you re-entering the garage. (After a battle or reloading the game client)

Default: unchecked

Package.Name: Enable changing of 'Battle!' button text
Package.Description:
Specify when the text for the fight button will be changed.

Note:
Disabled: The text will not be changed.
Only without platoon: The custom fight button text will be used if you're not inside a platoon.
Always: What do you think that could mean? :)\r\n\r\nHere you can define your own fight button text.
Note: Leave the text field blank to use the default text!

Default: RNG!

Package.Name: Only in single random battle mode (not in a platoon)
Show equipment usage in tooltip
Package.Description:
When enabled, the tooltip in the garage for equipment items additionally shows every tank where the selected item is in use.

Default: unchecked

Package.Name: Remove general chat button in garage
Package.Description:
If enabled the general chat button in the garage will be removed.
Note: Changes only take effect after you re-entering the garage. (After a battle or reloading the game client)

Default: unchecked

Package.Name: Remove dog tags display in battle
Package.Description:
If enabled, dog tags will not be displayed after your tank is destroyed.

Default: unchecked

Package.Name: Enable simple (legacy) tank parameters in garage
Package.Description:
If enabled, vehicle parameters catagory headers in the garage will be removed and the simple (legacy style) parameters are displayed.

Default: unchecked

Package.Name: Remove unread notifications counter in the menu received from 'Combat Intelligence'
Remove simple storage tooltip headers (when selling vehicle)
Package.Description:
If this option is activated, the simple headers of the vehicle parameters tooltip when selling a tank are removed.

Default: unchecked

Package.Name: OfflineMode Launcher [by {author}]
Package.Author: alphasave1
Package.Description:
This mod can start maps offline.
There is no tank and no gui, only the blank map to explore!
Only Works From Login Screen
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How to use:

1.Click the MOD list in the lower right corner of the login screen
2.Click on item OfflineMode Launcher
-> Launcher window opens
3.Select a map
4.Click the Load button
-> The map will load
5.Press the F key
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Keys:

WSAD: move camera
Numpad +/-: adjust FOV
Mouse Wheel: adjust speed
Escape: toggle mouse mode
F: toggle camera freeze mode
R: add new camera view point
0-7: change camera view point
N: move to previous camera view point
M: move to next camera view point
P: toggle post-precessing
C: toggle cinematic post-processing mode
T: toggle temporal AA
END: Game will quit
Alt+F4: , Game will quit.
PrtSc/SysRq: ScreenShot
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
About camera speed:
1.Copy the engine_config.xml from res/ to res_mods/1.1.0.1
2.Open XML file,edit ui/straferate value.
3.Save,Close.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Contact：Twitter 
alphasave1
Special Thanks : 
chirimenspiral , koreanrandom’s MODders

Package.Name: Replay Manager [by {author}]
Package.Author: WGMods
Package.Description:
Mod allows you to manage your game replays directly from the the game!

Main features of the mod:
- display in a convenient form all replays from the folder “replays”.
- sorting and filtering replays on various parameters, simplifying the search for the desired replay.
- viewing the results of the recorded battle in a convenient form.
- running the selected replay (is possible only after disconnecting from the server, and then restarting the client).
- upload replays to the site wotreplays.com and get a direct link to it.




by STL1te_P0LIR0ID 
German Translation by DOC73 

RU-Server: wotreplays.ru 
EU-Server: wotreplays.eu 
NA-Server: wotreplays.com

Package.Name: Seller [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: You need to either run or unpack the installer to get the mod
Package.Author: Jove
Package.Description:
quicker selling of unused items

Warning!
Don´t check "compatible with vehicles"!
Only if you want to sell shells/consumables/modules fitting to vehicles in your garage - but in most cases that´s not what people want!


by JOVE

Package.Name: ScriptloaderPro v{version}
Package.Description:
Script Loader PRO is an improved version of the usual script loader. 
It shows in the hangar which scripts are properly loaded.
A message appears in the message center for faulty scripts.
- Show Full Message with scriptname
- Show Minimal with sum of the scripts
- Show only error in messagecenter
- Check if exist obsolate “cameranode.pyc” in res_mods folder
- better Show faults in python.log
- Spamfilter for python.log file (individually configurable according to type of message)


by Budyx69

Package.Name: Simple Vehicle Stats [by {author}]
Package.Author: RaJCeL
Package.Description: These are vehicle parameters on single list.\r\n\r\nby RajCel

Package.Name: VehicleXP Extended [by {author}]
Package.Author: Izeberg
Package.Description:
This mod is calculating the amount of experience and battles before the next tank in the hangar.

You can see the amount of experience and battles required to investigate the next tank from the current one, as well as the amount of experience and battles for the tank to receive the “Elite” status.

The amount of experience near the key shows how much more you need to gain experience so that you can explore all the modules.
The experience near the golden star shows you the amount of experience needed to get the tank Elite status.
The experience near the silver star represents the required experience for exploring the next tank.
